about.title: Who we are
about.description: Apen & Asociados, Auditors and Consultants, is a leading firm in audit, consulting, and accounting services. We distinguish ourselves through our commitment to excellence and continuous improvement, offering specialized solutions tailored to our clients' needs.

mision.title: Mission
mision.text: Directing our efforts, experience, and professional knowledge towards our clients, helping them to be more competitive, profitable, and continuously improving their development in the global business market.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To provide high-quality and prestigious professional services that satisfy and exceed the needs and expectations of our clients, creating a level of integral development for our clients and for each member of our professional team.

valores.title: Values
valores.text: Our values are the foundation of our commitment to excellence and continuous improvement: Integrity, trust, objectivity, competence, and confidentiality.

international.title: International Representation
international.p1: Apen & Asociados, Auditors and Consultants is part of the IECnet network of Firms based in France.
international.p2: IECnet is a global network of accounting, auditing and tax consulting firms, with more than 70 selected member firms located in 60 countries and on 5 continents, 30 languages, more than 2,000 employees and 400 partners. IECnet is evolving with the global business in mind. Each member firm is a separate, qualified legal entity operating under the laws and regulations of its own country.
international.p3: IECnet ranked 30th in the International Accounting Bulletin World Survey 2024 with a turnover of 200 million dollars and has been a member of the Forum of Firms since 2009. The Forum of Firms (FoF) is an independent association of international networks of firms that perform transnational audits. The objective of the Forum is to promote consistent and high-quality standards of financial reporting and auditing practices worldwide, bringing together firms that perform transnational audits and involving them more closely with the activities of the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC) in auditing and other assurance-related areas.
